C

cancelRequestsProcessing() - Method in class com.mouseviator.fsuipc.FSUIPC
This function will cancel the thread that is running the continual request processing.
CDINeedleOffset - Variable in class com.mouseviator.fsuipc.helpers.avionics.NavRadioHelper
 
clearContinualRequests() - Method in class com.mouseviator.fsuipc.FSUIPC
This will clear an array of continual requests and stop continual request processing thread.
close() - Static method in class com.mouseviator.fsuipc.FSUIPCWrapper
Close the connection to FSUIPC.
CodeFlags(byte) - Constructor for class com.mouseviator.fsuipc.helpers.avionics.NavRadioHelper.CodeFlags
Constructs a new instance of this class.
codeFlagsOffset - Variable in class com.mouseviator.fsuipc.helpers.avionics.NavRadioHelper
 
com.mouseviator.fsuipc - package com.mouseviator.fsuipc
This package contains two main classes that implement the Java FSUIPC SDK.
com.mouseviator.fsuipc.datarequest - package com.mouseviator.fsuipc.datarequest
This package provides interfaces IDataRequest, IReadOnlyRequest and IWriteOnlyRequest and an abstract class DataRequest that are basic building blocks for creating data requests to use with FSUIPC class.
com.mouseviator.fsuipc.datarequest.advanced - package com.mouseviator.fsuipc.datarequest.advanced
This package contains above the primitive data type requests...
com.mouseviator.fsuipc.datarequest.primitives - package com.mouseviator.fsuipc.datarequest.primitives
This package contains classes that implement data request for primitive data types, such as Byte, Integer, Long, Float, Double, String...
com.mouseviator.fsuipc.helpers - package com.mouseviator.fsuipc.helpers
This package (and sub-packages) contains helper classes to get data requests for use with FSUIPC class to gather various sim data.
com.mouseviator.fsuipc.helpers.aircraft - package com.mouseviator.fsuipc.helpers.aircraft
This package contains helper classes to get data requests for use with FSUIPC class to gather various aircraft related data.
com.mouseviator.fsuipc.helpers.avionics - package com.mouseviator.fsuipc.helpers.avionics
This package contains helper classes to get data requests for use with FSUIPC class to gather various aircraft avionics related data.
COM1Helper - Class in com.mouseviator.fsuipc.helpers.avionics
This class provides methods that return data requests to gather/set various data from/to flight simulator COM1 radio.
COM1Helper() - Constructor for class com.mouseviator.fsuipc.helpers.avionics.COM1Helper
 
COM2Helper - Class in com.mouseviator.fsuipc.helpers.avionics
This class provides methods that return data requests to gather/set various data from/to flight simulator COM2 radio.
COM2Helper() - Constructor for class com.mouseviator.fsuipc.helpers.avionics.COM2Helper
 
connect(FSUIPCWrapper.FSUIPCSimVersion) - Method in class com.mouseviator.fsuipc.FSUIPC
Open FSUIPC connection to selected simulator version.
